verbs.description: pheasant and wild rice [ARG0: everyone] [ARGM-LOC: in my family] [V: hunts] so we have an abundance of game this recipe also works well with wild turkey or grouse and even with chicken if you prefer i love to make this dish on special occasions and for guests wild rice rice
